declarations.bibleVerseText: God called to him from within the bush, ‘Moses! Moses!’ And Moses said, ‘Here I am.’

declarations.text: God loves me enough to guide me with His perfect laws and instructions.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord said to Moses, ‘Come up to me on the mountain and stay here, and I will give you the tablets of stone with the law and commandments.’

declarations.text: God’s love is compassionate and merciful, forgiving my sins and shortcomings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord, the Lord, the compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness.

declarations.text: I am loved by God, who provides for my needs in every season.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord said to Moses, ‘I will rain down bread from heaven for you.’

declarations.text: God loves me enough to reveal His presence to me in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The glory of the Lord settled on Mount Sinai. For six days the cloud covered the mountain, and on the seventh day the Lord called to Moses from within the cloud.

declarations.text: I am valued by God, and He has set me apart for His holy purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now if you obey me fully and keep my covenant, then out of all nations you will be my treasured possession.

declarations.text: God loves me so much that He brings me out of places of bondage and into freedom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of Egypt, out of the land of slavery.

declarations.text: God is always near me, and His love surrounds me wherever I go.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is faithful and enduring, never changing through the ages.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He said, ‘I am the God of your father, the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac and the God of Jacob.’

declarations.text: I am protected by God’s love, and He shields me from harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When I see the blood, I will pass over you. No destructive plague will touch you when I strike Egypt.

declarations.text: God’s love brings me into His family and establishes me as His child.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then say to Pharaoh, ‘This is what the Lord says: Israel is my firstborn son.’

declarations.text: God’s love is so powerful that He makes a way for me where there is no way.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Moses stretched out his hand over the sea, and all that night the Lord drove the sea back with a strong east wind and turned it into dry land.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s plan, for He guides me on the right path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God said, 'I will be with you. And this will be the sign to you that it is I who have sent you.'

declarations.text: God empowers me to overcome challenges and obstacles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Moses, 'Who gave human beings their mouths? Who makes them deaf or mute? Who gives them sight or makes them blind? Is it not I, the Lord?'

declarations.text: I am not alone; God is my strength and my help.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God answered Moses, 'I will be with you. And this is your sign that I am the one who has sent you.'

declarations.text: I am protected by God, who fights my battles for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: God provides for all my needs, and I lack nothing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord said to Moses, 'I will rain down bread from heaven for you.'

declarations.text: I walk in God’s light, which leads me through every darkness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By day the Lord went ahead of them in a pillar of cloud to guide them on their way and by night in a pillar of fire to give them light.

declarations.text: God's power is at work in my life, bringing miracles and wonders.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Stretch out your hand over the sea so that the waters may flow back over the Egyptians and their chariots and horsemen.

declarations.text: I am led by God’s presence, which goes before me always.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers and answers me in His perfect timing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said, 'I have indeed seen the misery of my people in Egypt. I have heard them crying out because of their slave drivers.'

declarations.text: I am chosen by God to declare His glory to the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be for me a kingdom of priests and a holy nation.

declarations.text: God is my healer, bringing health and restoration to my body.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Lord, who heals you.

declarations.text: I find rest in God’s presence, which goes with me always.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord replied, 'My Presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.'

declarations.text: I am set apart by God, chosen for His purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now if you obey me fully and keep my covenant, then out of all nations you will be my treasured possession.

declarations.text: God's word is my guide, leading me in paths of righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You shall have no other gods before me.

declarations.text: I am protected under the wings of God’s love and grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He is my God, and I will praise him, my father’s God, and I will exalt him.

declarations.text: God is my provider, and He meets all my needs abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord said to Moses, 'I will rain down bread from heaven for you.'

declarations.text: I am a child of God, chosen and loved by Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then say to Pharaoh, 'This is what the Lord says: Israel is my firstborn son.'

declarations.text: God leads me to a place of promise and abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I have promised to bring you up out of your misery in Egypt into the land of the Canaanites, Hittites, Amorites, Perizzites, Hivites and Jebusites—a land flowing with milk and honey.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s timing, for He makes all things beautiful.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Moses, 'I will do the very thing you have asked, because I am pleased with you and I know you by name.'

declarations.text: I am called by God to fulfill His purposes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now go; I will help you speak and will teach you what to say.

declarations.text: God is my protector, and He surrounds me with His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the angel of God, who had been traveling in front of Israel’s army, withdrew and went behind them.

declarations.text: I am strengthened by God to do His will.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God said to Moses, 'I AM WHO I AM.'

declarations.text: God is my refuge and my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my defense; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, lighting my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tablets were the work of God; the writing was the writing of God, engraved on the tablets.

declarations.text: I am empowered by God to face every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Moses, 'Why are you crying out to me? Tell the Israelites to move on.'

declarations.text: God leads me with His wisdom and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By the day the Lord went ahead of them in a pillar of cloud to guide them on their way.

declarations.text: God equips me with the skills and abilities I need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have filled him with the Spirit of God, with wisdom, with understanding, with knowledge and with all kinds of skills.

declarations.text: I am favored by God and find grace in His sight.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the Lord said unto Moses, I will do this thing also that thou hast spoken: for thou hast found grace in my sight.

declarations.text: God is my provider, and He supplies all my needs.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When the Israelites saw it, they said to each other, 'What is it?' For they did not know what it was. Moses said to them, 'It is the bread the Lord has given you to eat.'

declarations.text: I am led by God’s presence every day of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By day the Lord went ahead of them in a pillar of cloud to guide them on their way and by night in a pillar of fire to give them light.

declarations.text: God fills my life with His peace and presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the cloud covered the tent of meeting, and the glory of the Lord filled the tabernacle.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s power, which works wonders in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will harden Pharaoh's heart, and though I multiply my signs and wonders in Egypt.

declarations.text: God is my healer, and He brings me health and wholeness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you listen carefully to the Lord your God and do what is right in his eyes, if you pay attention to his commands and keep all his decrees, I will not bring on you any of the diseases I brought on the Egyptians, for I am the Lord, who heals you.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God to be His special possession.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Although the whole earth is mine, you will be for me a kingdom of priests and a holy nation.

declarations.text: God is faithful, and He keeps His covenant with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will take you as my own people, and I will be your God. Then you will know that I am the Lord your God, who brought you out from under the yoke of the Egyptians.

declarations.text: I walk in God’s protection and safety.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blood will be a sign for you on the houses where you are, and when I see the blood, I will pass over you.

declarations.text: God reveals His glory to me, and I am transformed by it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the Lord said, 'I will cause all my goodness to pass in front of you, and I will proclaim my name, the Lord, in your presence.'

declarations.text: I am filled with God’s spirit, wisdom, and understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See, I have chosen Bezalel son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah, and I have filled him with the Spirit of God, with wisdom, with understanding, with knowledge and with all kinds of skills.

declarations.text: God’s presence brings me rest and refreshes my soul.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Six days you shall labor, but on the seventh day you shall rest; even during the plowing season and harvest you must rest.

declarations.text: God sees my struggles and acts on my behalf.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said, 'I have indeed seen the misery of my people in Egypt. I have heard them crying out because of their slave drivers, and I am concerned about their suffering.'

declarations.text: I am confident that God will lead me to victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord hardened Pharaoh’s heart, and he would not let the Israelites go.

declarations.text: God is my refuge and fortress in times of trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Moses answered the people, 'Do not be afraid. Stand firm and you will see the deliverance the Lord will bring you today.'

declarations.text: God turns my hardships into blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Moses cried out to the Lord, and the Lord showed him a piece of wood. He threw it into the water, and the water became fit to drink.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s perfect plan for my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord said to Moses, 'See, I have made you like God to Pharaoh, and your brother Aaron will be your prophet.'

declarations.text: God’s commands guide me on the path of righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God spoke all these words: 'I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of Egypt, out of the land of slavery.'

declarations.text: I am surrounded by God’s divine protection.
declarations.bibleVerseText: At the morning watch, the Lord looked down at the army of the Egyptians through the pillar of fire and cloud and brought the army of the Egyptians into confusion.

declarations.text: God blesses me with rest and refreshes my soul.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord replied, 'My Presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.'

declarations.text: I am confident in God’s power to deliver me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the Egyptians will know that I am the Lord when I stretch out my hand against Egypt and bring the Israelites out of it.

declarations.text: God provides for me abundantly each day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In the evening quail came and covered the camp, and in the morning there was a layer of dew around the camp.

declarations.text: I am filled with God’s wisdom and understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord said to Moses, 'See, I have chosen Bezalel son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah, and I have filled him with the Spirit of God, with wisdom, with understanding, with knowledge and with all kinds of skills.'

declarations.text: God’s presence fills my life with His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the cloud covered the tent of meeting, and the glory of the Lord filled the tabernacle.

declarations.text: I am set free by the power of God’s mighty hand.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So I will stretch out my hand and strike the Egyptians with all the wonders that I will perform among them. After that, he will let you go.

declarations.text: God gives me strength to face every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But lift up your staff and stretch out your hand over the sea to divide the water so that the Israelites can go through the sea on dry ground.

declarations.text: God has chosen me as His special possession.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now if you obey me fully and keep my covenant, then out of all nations you will be my treasured possession.

declarations.text: I follow God’s instructions, and He brings me success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then have them make a sanctuary for me, and I will dwell among them.

declarations.text: God provides me with guidance and wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord said to Moses, 'Tell the Israelites this: You have seen for yourselves that I have spoken to you from heaven.'

declarations.text: I am confident in God’s promise to lead me to a better place.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I have raised you up for this very purpose, that I might show you my power and that my name might be proclaimed in all the earth.

declarations.text: God is my light, and He leads me through every darkness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By day the Lord went ahead of them in a pillar of cloud to guide them on their way and by night in a pillar of fire to give them light, so that they could travel by day or night.

declarations.text: God is my strength, and He makes me victorious.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Moses built an altar and called it The Lord is my Banner. He said, 'Because hands were lifted up against the throne of the Lord, the Lord will be at war against the Amalekites from generation to generation.'

declarations.text: I am holy because God has set me apart for His purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You must be holy because I, the Lord your God, am holy.

declarations.text: God's commands guide me to live a life of integrity and love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not seek revenge or bear a grudge against a fellow Israelite, but love your neighbor as yourself. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I walk in obedience to God's word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you follow my decrees and are careful to obey my commands, I will send you rain in its season, and the ground will yield its crops and the trees their fruit.

declarations.text: God is my provider, giving me more than enough.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will eat the old supply of grain, and you will need to clear it out to make room for the new harvest.

declarations.text: I find rest in God’s presence, which gives me peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will grant peace in the land, and you will lie down and no one will make you afraid.

declarations.text: I am forgiven and cleansed by God’s grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will remember my covenant with Jacob and my covenant with Isaac and my covenant with Abraham, and I will remember the land.

declarations.text: God calls me to live a life of honesty and truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not steal. Do not deceive or cheat one another.

declarations.text: I am filled with God’s love and share it with others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not take advantage of each other, but fear your God. I am the Lord your God.

declarations.text: God’s favor is upon me, bringing me success in all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will look on you with favor and make you fruitful and increase your numbers, and I will keep my covenant with you.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s provision, which is always enough for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: On the sixth year, you will gather crops enough for three years.

declarations.text: I am called to be generous, helping those in need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and for the foreigner residing among you. I am the Lord your God.

declarations.text: God’s presence dwells with me, and I am never alone.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will put my dwelling place among you, and I will not abhor you.

declarations.text: I am set free from bondage because God has redeemed me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of Egypt so that you would no longer be slaves to the Egyptians; I broke the bars of your yoke and enabled you to walk with heads held high.

declarations.text: God calls me to live a life of purity and dedication to Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Consecrate yourselves and be holy, because I am the Lord your God.

declarations.text: I walk in the light of God’s commands, bringing peace to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep my decrees and follow them. I am the Lord, who makes you holy.

declarations.text: I am called to love and respect others as God commands.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Stand up in the presence of the aged, show respect for the elderly and revere your God. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: God gives me the strength to live according to His will.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep my commands and follow them. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I honor God’s name and live for Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not profane my holy name, for I must be acknowledged as holy by the Israelites. I am the Lord, who made you holy.

declarations.text: God is my sanctuary and place of rest.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Observe my Sabbaths and have reverence for my sanctuary. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God to be His own and to declare His praises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will walk among you and be your God, and you will be my people.

declarations.text: I am set apart by God to live a life that honors Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You must therefore make a distinction between clean and unclean animals and between clean and unclean birds. Do not defile yourselves by any animal or bird or anything that moves along the ground—those that I have set apart as unclean for you.

declarations.text: God’s commands guide me to walk in His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep all my decrees and all my laws and follow them. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: I am cleansed and made whole by God’s grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the priest is to take some of the blood of the guilt offering and put it on the lobe of the right ear of the one to be cleansed, on the thumb of their right hand and on the big toe of their right foot.

declarations.text: God’s laws are a light to my path, leading me to righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep my decrees and follow them. I am the Lord, who makes you holy.

declarations.text: I am called to live a life of purity and devotion to God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not make yourselves unclean by any creature that moves along the ground. I am the Lord, who brought you up out of Egypt to be your God; therefore be holy, because I am holy.

declarations.text: God’s holiness is my standard, and I strive to reflect it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Lord your God; consecrate yourselves and be holy, because I am holy.

declarations.text: I am secure in God’s promise of provision and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will send you rain in its season, and the ground will yield its crops and the trees their fruit.

declarations.text: God teaches me to love others with kindness and respect.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not curse the deaf or put a stumbling block in front of the blind, but fear your God. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I honor God’s sabbath and find rest in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There are six days when you may work, but the seventh day is a day of sabbath rest, a day of sacred assembly. You are not to do any work; wherever you live, it is a sabbath to the Lord.

declarations.text: God calls me to be just and fair in all my dealings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not use dishonest standards when measuring length, weight, or quantity. Use honest scales and honest weights, an honest ephah and an honest hin. I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of Egypt.

declarations.text: I am filled with God’s peace as I live according to His commands.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will grant peace in the land, and you will lie down and no one will make you afraid.

declarations.text: God’s presence brings me strength and courage.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will put my dwelling place among you, and I will not abhor you. I will walk among you and be your God, and you will be my people.

declarations.text: I am called to honor God in all I do, reflecting His holiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep my commands and follow them. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: God’s blessings overflow in my life as I obey His word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will send you such a blessing in the sixth year that the land will yield enough for three years.

declarations.text: I am made holy by God’s word and His calling on my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep all my decrees and all my laws and follow them. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: God’s truth sets me free to live in His love and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not lie. Do not deceive one another.

declarations.text: I am called to be a light, showing God’s love to the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love your neighbor as yourself. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, and I live by its truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep my decrees and follow them. I am the Lord, who makes you holy.

declarations.text: I am under God’s protection, safe and secure in His care.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will grant peace in the land, and you will lie down and no one will make you afraid.

declarations.text: God is my sanctuary, and I find refuge in His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Observe my Sabbaths and have reverence for my sanctuary. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: I trust in God's timing, knowing He has a plan for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are to count off seven sabbath years—seven times seven years—so that the seven sabbath years amount to a period of forty-nine years.

declarations.text: God’s blessings overflow in my life as I follow His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will walk among you and be your God, and you will be my people.

declarations.text: I live in God’s abundance and provision every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fiftieth year shall be a jubilee for you; do not sow and do not reap what grows of itself or harvest the untended vines.

declarations.text: God’s holiness is my standard, and I strive to reflect it in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not defile yourselves by turning to mediums or to those who consult the spirits of the dead. I am the Lord your God.

declarations.text: I honor God with my body, as a temple of His Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep all my decrees and follow them. I am the Lord, who makes you holy.

declarations.text: God is faithful to His promises, and I trust in His word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will remember my covenant with Jacob and my covenant with Isaac and my covenant with Abraham, and I will remember the land.

declarations.text: I am called to live a life of integrity and truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You must not act dishonestly in using measures of length, weight, or volume.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is steadfast and unchanging.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I obey God’s commands and walk in His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you follow my decrees and are careful to obey my commands, I will send you rain in its season, and the ground will yield its crops and the trees their fruit.

declarations.text: God calls me to be set apart, living in holiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are to be holy to me because I, the Lord, am holy, and I have set you apart from the nations to be my own.

declarations.text: I am grateful for God's provision, and I share His blessings with others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and for the foreigner residing among you.

declarations.text: God’s peace fills my heart as I keep His sabbath rest.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The land is to have a year of sabbath rest, a sabbath to the Lord.

declarations.text: I honor God with my words and actions, reflecting His character.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not swear falsely by my name and so profane the name of your God. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: God provides me with guidance and wisdom in all things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: These are the Lord’s appointed festivals, the sacred assemblies you are to proclaim at their appointed times.

declarations.text: I am called to be generous and kind, showing God's love to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When a foreigner resides among you in your land, do not mistreat them. The foreigner residing among you must be treated as your native-born. Love them as yourself.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, leading me to live in truth and love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep all my decrees and all my laws and follow them. I am the Lord.

declarations.text: I am blessed with God's favor as I live according to His word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will look on you with favor and make you fruitful and increase your numbers, and I will keep my covenant with you.

declarations.text: God’s love and care are with me always, guiding my every step.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will walk among you and be your God, and you will be my people.

declarations.text: I am the light of the world, shining brightly with God’s love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.

declarations.text: I seek God’s kingdom first, and He provides for all my needs.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I am humble, for I inherit God’s kingdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

declarations.text: I am loved and valued by God more than anything else in creation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And even the very hairs of your head are all numbered. So don’t be afraid; you are worth more than many sparrows.

declarations.text: God gives me rest for my soul when I come to Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: I forgive others as God has forgiven me, freeing my heart from bitterness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For if you forgive other people when they sin against you, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.

declarations.text: I am the salt of the earth, adding value and flavor to the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness, how can it be made salty again?

declarations.text: I trust in God’s plan, knowing He cares for me deeply.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Look at the birds of the air; they do not sow or reap or store away in barns, and yet your heavenly Father feeds them. Are you not much more valuable than they?

declarations.text: God’s peace fills my heart, and I do not worry about tomorrow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.

declarations.text: I am guided by God’s wisdom, building my life on a solid foundation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore everyone who hears these words of mine and puts them into practice is like a wise man who built his house on the rock.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I show mercy, for I will be shown mercy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy.

declarations.text: God’s love is perfect, and He calls me to love others as He loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect.

declarations.text: I am a child of God, reflecting His peace and love to the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called children of God.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers and answers according to His will.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I hunger for righteousness, for I will be filled.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they will be filled.

declarations.text: I am called to love others with the love that God has given me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, and I follow His path of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Man shall not live on bread alone, but on every word that comes from the mouth of God.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I am meek, for I will inherit the earth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.

declarations.text: God's presence is with me always, bringing comfort and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

declarations.text: I am a vessel of God's love and compassion, reaching out to those in need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.

declarations.text: I have faith in God, and nothing is impossible for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Everything is possible for one who believes.

declarations.text: I am called to serve others with a humble heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For even the Son of Man did not come to be served, but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

declarations.text: I am the salt of the earth, bringing flavor to the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Salt is good, but if it loses its saltiness, how can you make it salty again? Have salt among yourselves, and be at peace with each other.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and I trust in His perfect timing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask for in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because God is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take heart! It is I. Don’t be afraid.

declarations.text: I am a light in the darkness, sharing God’s love with others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.

declarations.text: I am filled with peace because I know God is in control.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He got up, rebuked the wind and said to the waves, 'Quiet! Be still!' Then the wind died down and it was completely calm.

declarations.text: I am called to follow Jesus, taking up my cross daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever wants to be my disciple must deny themselves and take up their cross and follow me.

declarations.text: I believe in God’s healing power and receive it by faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He said to her, 'Daughter, your faith has healed you. Go in peace and be freed from your suffering.'

declarations.text: I am forgiven because of God’s love and grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When Jesus saw their faith, he said to the paralyzed man, 'Son, your sins are forgiven.'

declarations.text: I trust in God’s word, which is powerful and true.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.

declarations.text: I am called to love others as Jesus loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love your neighbor as yourself.

declarations.text: God gives me strength to overcome every obstacle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With man this is impossible, but not with God; all things are possible with God.

declarations.text: I speak God’s word with boldness and courage.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation.

declarations.text: I am forgiven and made new through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: This is my blood of the covenant, which is poured out for many.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s promises, and they are fulfilled in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you can? said Jesus. 'Everything is possible for one who believes.'

declarations.text: I have faith in God’s power to move mountains in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly I tell you, if anyone says to this mountain, ‘Go, throw yourself into the sea,’ and does not doubt in their heart but believes that what they say will happen, it will be done for them.

declarations.text: I find rest in God, who renews my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Come with me by yourselves to a quiet place and get some rest.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s protection, knowing He is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when they arrest you, do not worry beforehand about what to say. Just say whatever is given you at the time, for it is not you speaking, but the Holy Spirit.

declarations.text: I walk in faith, believing that God’s promises are true.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Have faith in God.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s promises, for with Him nothing is impossible.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For no word from God will ever fail.

declarations.text: I am filled with joy because the Lord is my Savior.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My soul glorifies the Lord and my spirit rejoices in God my Savior.

declarations.text: God’s peace guards my heart and mind.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Glory to God in the highest heaven, and on earth peace to those on whom his favor rests.

declarations.text: I have God’s favor, and I grow in wisdom and stature.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And Jesus grew in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and man.

declarations.text: I am anointed by God to bring good news to the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor.

declarations.text: I live by God’s word, which is my daily bread.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jesus answered, 'It is written: Man shall not live on bread alone.'

declarations.text: I am called to love my enemies and do good to those who hurt me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But to you who are listening I say: Love your enemies, do good to those who hate you.

declarations.text: God forgives me as I forgive others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Forgive, and you will be forgiven.

declarations.text: I have faith the size of a mustard seed, and it moves mountains.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mulberry tree, 'Be uprooted and planted in the sea,' and it will obey you.

declarations.text: God’s kingdom is within me, bringing me peace and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The kingdom of God is within you.

declarations.text: I am called to be merciful, just as God is merciful to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be merciful, just as your Father is merciful.

declarations.text: I have been given the power and authority to overcome all challenges.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He gave them power and authority to drive out all demons and to cure diseases.

declarations.text: I am called to be a servant, for the greatest in God’s kingdom is the servant of all.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For it is the one who is least among you all who is the greatest.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s provision, knowing He cares for me more than the birds of the air.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Consider the ravens: They do not sow or reap, they have no storeroom or barn; yet God feeds them. And how much more valuable you are than birds!

declarations.text: I seek God’s kingdom first, and He provides everything I need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek his kingdom, and these things will be given to you as well.

declarations.text: I am called to be like a child, humble and trusting in God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly I tell you, anyone who will not receive the kingdom of God like a little child will never enter it.

declarations.text: God seeks and saves the lost, and I am found in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Son of Man came to seek and to save the lost.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s words, for they are spirit and life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.

declarations.text: I am a witness to God’s truth and proclaim His love to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are witnesses of these things.

declarations.text: I have peace in my heart because Jesus has overcome the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Peace be with you.

declarations.text: I am a child of God, loved and accepted just as I am.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Yet to all who did receive him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God.

declarations.text: God’s light shines in me, and no darkness can overcome it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.

declarations.text: I have eternal life because I believe in Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

declarations.text: I am born of the Spirit and live a new life in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Very truly I tell you, no one can enter the kingdom of God unless they are born of water and the Spirit.

declarations.text: I am loved unconditionally by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you. Now remain in my love.

declarations.text: God’s truth sets me free, and I am free indeed.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

declarations.text: I have abundant life through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.

declarations.text: I am filled with God’s peace, which surpasses all understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

declarations.text: I am the light of the world because I have the light of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When Jesus spoke again to the people, he said, 'I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.'

declarations.text: God hears my prayers and answers according to His will.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will do whatever you ask in my name, so that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

declarations.text: I am loved by God and chosen for His purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You did not choose me, but I chose you and appointed you so that you might go and bear fruit—fruit that will last.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s plan for my life, knowing He works all things for my good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jesus replied, 'You do not realize now what I am doing, but later you will understand.'

declarations.text: I am made clean through the word God has spoken to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are already clean because of the word I have spoken to you.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is greater than any fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.

declarations.text: I am a friend of Jesus because I do what He commands.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are my friends if you do what I command.

declarations.text: I have the Holy Spirit as my helper, guiding me into all truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when he, the Spirit of truth, comes, he will guide you into all the truth.

declarations.text: I am not alone, for God is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Yet I am not alone, for my Father is with me.

declarations.text: God has given me joy that no one can take away.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So with you: Now is your time of grief, but I will see you again and you will rejoice, and no one will take away your joy.

declarations.text: I am called to love others as Jesus has loved me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.

declarations.text: I am one with Christ, and His love flows through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

declarations.text: I am free from condemnation because I believe in Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever believes in him is not condemned, but whoever does not believe stands condemned already because they have not believed in the name of God’s one and only Son.

declarations.text: I have life and joy in abundance through Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have told you this so that my joy may be in you and that your joy may be complete.

declarations.text: I am protected and held in God’s hand, secure in His love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish; no one will snatch them out of my hand.

declarations.text: I am a new creation in Christ, free from my past.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed.

declarations.text: I live in the light of Jesus, walking in His truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: While I am in the world, I am the light of the world.

declarations.text: God’s grace is sufficient for me, and I receive it in abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Out of his fullness we have all received grace in place of grace already given.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God and called to bear lasting fruit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You did not choose me, but I chose you and appointed you so that you might go and bear fruit—fruit that will last.

declarations.text: I am made whole in Jesus, the true bread of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Jesus declared, 'I am the bread of life. Whoever comes to me will never go hungry, and whoever believes in me will never be thirsty.'

declarations.text: I am fully known and fully loved by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me.

declarations.text: God gives me rest and peace in the midst of my troubles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: I am one with the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you.

declarations.text: I abide in Christ, and His love and power flow through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Remain in me, as I also remain in you. No branch can bear fruit by itself; it must remain in the vine.

declarations.text: I am comforted by the Holy Spirit, who is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will ask the Father, and he will give you another advocate to help you and be with you forever—the Spirit of truth.

declarations.text: I have God’s word dwelling in me, giving me life and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you remain in me and my words remain in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be done for you.

declarations.text: I trust in Jesus, who is the way, the truth, and the life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jesus answered, 'I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.'

declarations.text: God’s glory is revealed in me, and I reflect His love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have given them the glory that you gave me, that they may be one as we are one.

declarations.text: I am God’s beloved, and He delights in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you. Now remain in my love.

declarations.text: I have faith in Jesus, and rivers of living water flow from within me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever believes in me, as Scripture has said, rivers of living water will flow from within them.

declarations.text: I am a witness to God’s love and truth in this world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As you sent me into the world, I have sent them into the world.

declarations.text: I am free from condemnation because I belong to Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, there is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Him who loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: God is for me, so nothing can be against me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If God is for us, who can be against us?

declarations.text: I am transformed by renewing my mind with God’s word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.

declarations.text: I live by faith, and I am made righteous in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous will live by faith.

declarations.text: I am forgiven and made new through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God, and all are justified freely by his grace through the redemption that came by Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am filled with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.

declarations.text: I am justified by faith and have peace with God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: God works all things together for my good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

declarations.text: I am called to be a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, I urge you, brothers and sisters, in view of God’s mercy, to offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God—this is your true and proper worship.

declarations.text: I am a new creation in Christ, set free from sin.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we know that our old self was crucified with him so that the body ruled by sin might be done away with, that we should no longer be slaves to sin.

declarations.text: I am loved by God, and nothing can separate me from His love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers, neither height nor depth, nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

declarations.text: I am dead to sin and alive to God in Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In the same way, count yourselves dead to sin but alive to God in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I live by the Spirit, and I am not controlled by my sinful nature.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Those who live according to the flesh have their minds set on what the flesh desires; but those who live in accordance with the Spirit have their minds set on what the Spirit desires.

declarations.text: I am God’s masterpiece, created to do good works.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

declarations.text: I am set free from the law of sin and death.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because through Christ Jesus the law of the Spirit who gives life has set you free from the law of sin and death.

declarations.text: God has poured His love into my heart through the Holy Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And hope does not put us to shame, because God’s love has been poured out into our hearts through the Holy Spirit, who has been given to us.

declarations.text: I live in the freedom and power of God’s grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For sin shall no longer be your master, because you are not under the law, but under grace.

declarations.text: I am patient in affliction and faithful in prayer.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.

declarations.text: I am saved by confessing Jesus as Lord and believing in my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you declare with your mouth, 'Jesus is Lord,' and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.

declarations.text: I am called to love others sincerely.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love must be sincere. Hate what is evil; cling to what is good.

declarations.text: I am part of the body of Christ and have unique gifts to share.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We have different gifts, according to the grace given to each of us.

declarations.text: I am a servant of God, offering my life to Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God—this is your true and proper worship.

declarations.text: I am at peace with everyone as far as it depends on me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If it is possible, as far as it depends on you, live at peace with everyone.

declarations.text: I am kind and compassionate, showing love to my enemies.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If your enemy is hungry, feed him; if he is thirsty, give him something to drink.

declarations.text: I am a vessel of God’s mercy, showing His love to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: What if he did this to make the riches of his glory known to the objects of his mercy, whom he prepared in advance for glory.

declarations.text: I am made righteous through faith, not by my works.
declarations.bibleVerseText: This righteousness is given through faith in Jesus Christ to all who believe.

declarations.text: I am set apart for God’s purpose, and He is glorified in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For those God foreknew he also predestined to be conformed to the image of his Son.

declarations.text: I have the Spirit of God living in me, giving me life and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The mind governed by the Spirit is life and peace.

declarations.text: I am patient in hope and trust in God’s perfect timing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But if we hope for what we do not yet have, we wait for it patiently.

declarations.text: I am called to be a light, repaying evil with good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.

declarations.text: I am filled with joy because of my hope in God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.

declarations.text: I am chosen and called by God’s grace to belong to Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And you also are among those Gentiles who are called to belong to Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I am being transformed daily into the image of Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

declarations.text: I am united with Christ in His death and resurrection.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For if we have been united with him in a death like his, we will certainly also be united with him in a resurrection like his.

declarations.text: I am a member of Christ’s body, and each part has a special function.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So in Christ we, though many, form one body, and each member belongs to all the others.

declarations.text: I am a servant of righteousness, living a life that pleases God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have been set free from sin and have become slaves to righteousness.

declarations.text: I have the Holy Spirit interceding for me with groans that words cannot express.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In the same way, the Spirit helps us in our weakness. We do not know what we ought to pray for, but the Spirit himself intercedes for us through wordless groans.

declarations.text: I am an overcomer through the blood of Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: I am filled with hope and joy, waiting eagerly for what God has promised.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But if we hope for what we do not yet have, we wait for it patiently.

declarations.text: The Lord is my shepherd, and I have all that I need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I lack nothing.

declarations.text: God is my refuge and strength, my help in times of trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

declarations.text: I am fearfully and wonderfully made by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.

declarations.text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; I have nothing to fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear?

declarations.text: I trust in God’s perfect timing and plans for my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be still before the Lord and wait patiently for him.

declarations.text: God’s love and mercy follow me all the days of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely your goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by God’s protection and love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For he will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways.

declarations.text: God renews my strength and gives me peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He refreshes my soul. He guides me along the right paths for his name’s sake.

declarations.text: I take refuge in God and am safe under His wings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.

declarations.text: God is my rock and my fortress, my deliverer and shield.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge, my shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I trust in the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who trusts in the Lord, who does not look to the proud, to those who turn aside to false gods.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers and answers me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I waited patiently for the Lord; he turned to me and heard my cry.

declarations.text: I find joy and delight in God’s word, which guides me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

declarations.text: God is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.

declarations.text: I rest in God’s peace, for He makes me dwell in safety.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In peace I will lie down and sleep, for you alone, Lord, make me dwell in safety.

declarations.text: God is with me in the valley, comforting and guiding me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.

declarations.text: I sing praises to the Lord for His goodness and faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will sing of the Lord’s great love forever; with my mouth I will make your faithfulness known through all generations.

declarations.text: God’s mercy is new every morning, and His love is unfailing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I will sing of your strength, in the morning I will sing of your love; for you are my fortress, my refuge in times of trouble.

declarations.text: I am confident in God’s unfailing love and salvation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I trust in your unfailing love; my heart rejoices in your salvation.

declarations.text: I lift my eyes to the Lord, my helper and my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I lift up my eyes to the mountains—where does my help come from? My help comes from the Lord, the Maker of heaven and earth.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He renews my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and take heart, all you who hope in the Lord.

declarations.text: God’s word is perfect, reviving my soul and giving me wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The law of the Lord is perfect, refreshing the soul. The statutes of the Lord are trustworthy, making wise the simple.

declarations.text: I sing for joy because the Lord has done great things for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord has done great things for us, and we are filled with joy.

declarations.text: The Lord hears my cries and delivers me from all my fears.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.

declarations.text: I will not fear, for the Lord is with me; He is my helper.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is with me; I will not be afraid. What can mere mortals do to me?

declarations.text: God’s love is unfailing, and His faithfulness continues forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.

declarations.text: I will praise the Lord at all times; His praise will always be on my lips.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will extol the Lord at all times; his praise will always be on my lips.

declarations.text: God is my rock and salvation; I will not be shaken.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly he is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will not be shaken.

declarations.text: I am safe in the Lord, for He is my refuge and my fortress.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will say of the Lord, 'He is my refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust.'

declarations.text: The Lord is close to me when I am brokenhearted and saves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.

declarations.text: I will not be shaken because the Lord is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I keep my eyes always on the Lord. With him at my right hand, I will not be shaken.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, giving me understanding and wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The unfolding of your words gives light; it gives understanding to the simple.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because the Lord is my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my defense; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: God’s promises are pure, and I trust in His unfailing word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the words of the Lord are flawless, like silver purified in a crucible, like gold refined seven times.

declarations.text: I rejoice in the day the Lord has made; I am glad and give thanks.
declarations.bibleVerseText: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.

declarations.text: I lift my soul to the Lord, trusting in His faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In you, Lord my God, I put my trust. I trust in you; do not let me be put to shame, nor let my enemies triumph over me.

declarations.text: I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers and lifts me out of the depths.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Out of the depths I cry to you, Lord; Lord, hear my voice.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I walk in the way of the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those whose ways are blameless, who walk according to the law of the Lord.

declarations.text: I find joy in the Lord, for He is my strength and my song.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: God's word revives my soul and gives me wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The law of the Lord is perfect, refreshing the soul. The statutes of the Lord are trustworthy, making wise the simple.

declarations.text: I put my trust in the Lord, for He is my rock and fortress.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly he is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will never be shaken.

declarations.text: God's love is my protection; He surrounds me with favor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: I rejoice in God's unfailing love, for He has rescued me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I trust in your unfailing love; my heart rejoices in your salvation.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I walk in God's wisdom and guidance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who does not walk in step with the wicked or stand in the way that sinners take or sit in the company of mockers.

declarations.text: God is my hiding place; He protects me from trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.

declarations.text: I lift my hands to God in praise, for His love is better than life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because your love is better than life, my lips will glorify you.

declarations.text: God’s goodness and mercy follow me all the days of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely your goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life.

declarations.text: I meditate on God's word, and it gives me strength and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I meditate on your precepts and consider your ways.

declarations.text: I will sing a new song to the Lord, for He has done marvelous things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Sing to the Lord a new song, for he has done marvelous things; his right hand and his holy arm have worked salvation for him.

declarations.text: The Lord is my portion; I have all that I need in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are my portion, Lord; I have promised to obey your words.

declarations.text: I am still and know that God is with me, my refuge and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.

declarations.text: God’s word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

declarations.text: I lift my eyes to the mountains, knowing my help comes from the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I lift up my eyes to the mountains—where does my help come from? My help comes from the Lord, the Maker of heaven and earth.

declarations.text: God is my deliverer; He rescues me from all my troubles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous cry out, and the Lord hears them; he delivers them from all their troubles.

declarations.text: I praise the Lord, for His faithfulness endures forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good; his love endures forever.

declarations.text: I am protected by the Lord, who watches over my coming and going.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.

declarations.text: I give thanks to the Lord with all my heart; He is my strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will give thanks to you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all your wonderful deeds.

declarations.text: I find rest in God alone, my hope and my salvation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Truly my soul finds rest in God; my salvation comes from him.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord with all my heart, and He guides my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

declarations.text: I am wise and live a life of integrity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever walks in integrity walks securely, but whoever takes crooked paths will be found out.

declarations.text: I seek wisdom, for it is more precious than jewels.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For wisdom is more precious than rubies, and nothing you desire can compare with her.

declarations.text: I speak words of kindness and bring healing to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Gracious words are a honeycomb, sweet to the soul and healing to the bones.

declarations.text: I seek God’s wisdom, and He directs my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In their hearts humans plan their course, but the Lord establishes their steps.

declarations.text: I listen to wise counsel and grow in understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Listen to advice and accept discipline, and at the end you will be counted among the wise.

declarations.text: I am diligent in my work, and it brings prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: All hard work brings a profit, but mere talk leads only to poverty.

declarations.text: I choose my words carefully, speaking with wisdom and love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit.

declarations.text: I am a peacemaker, sowing seeds of peace wherever I go.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Deceit is in the hearts of those who plot evil, but those who promote peace have joy.

declarations.text: I am generous and lend freely, and I am blessed in return.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A generous person will prosper; whoever refreshes others will be refreshed.

declarations.text: I am wise, for I fear the Lord and turn away from evil.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom, and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.

declarations.text: I walk with the wise and grow in wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Walk with the wise and become wise, for a companion of fools suffers harm.

declarations.text: I have a cheerful heart, and it brings healing to my body.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He grants me peace and prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord’s blessing brings wealth, without painful toil for it.

declarations.text: I seek God’s wisdom daily, for it brings life and favor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For those who find me find life and receive favor from the Lord.

declarations.text: I act with integrity, and the Lord directs my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The integrity of the upright guides them, but the unfaithful are destroyed by their duplicity.

declarations.text: I find safety in seeking wise counsel.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For lack of guidance a nation falls, but victory is won through many advisers.

declarations.text: I am filled with wisdom, for it brings joy and understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wisdom brightens the face and changes its hard appearance.

declarations.text: I listen before I speak, and my words are wise.
declarations.bibleVerseText: To answer before listening—that is folly and shame.

declarations.text: I am wise because I seek knowledge and understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The heart of the discerning acquires knowledge, for the ears of the wise seek it out.

declarations.text: I speak words of life and bring encouragement to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Gracious words are a honeycomb, sweet to the soul and healing to the bones.

declarations.text: I live with a heart of humility, gaining wisdom through correction.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Where there is strife, there is pride, but wisdom is found in those who take advice.

declarations.text: I am diligent and work hard, leading to abundance and success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The plans of the diligent lead to profit as surely as haste leads to poverty.

declarations.text: I choose my friends wisely, for they influence my character.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not make friends with a hot-tempered person, do not associate with one easily angered.

declarations.text: I am blessed when I honor the Lord with my wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops.

declarations.text: I walk the path of righteousness, which leads to life and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In the way of righteousness there is life; along that path is immortality.

declarations.text: I am slow to anger, and I bring peace in difficult situations.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A hot-tempered person stirs up conflict, but the one who is patient calms a quarrel.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He shields me from harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Every word of God is flawless; he is a shield to those who take refuge in him.

declarations.text: I speak truthfully, for honesty guides my every word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord detests lying lips, but he delights in people who are trustworthy.

declarations.text: I am filled with joy, for a cheerful heart brings healing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

declarations.text: I value wisdom, for it leads to a long and peaceful life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Long life is in her right hand; in her left hand are riches and honor.

declarations.text: I speak with kindness, and my words bring life and healing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The soothing tongue is a tree of life, but a perverse tongue crushes the spirit.

declarations.text: I seek knowledge, for it is more valuable than silver and gold.
declarations.bibleVerseText: How much better to get wisdom than gold, to get insight rather than silver!

declarations.text: I have a heart of understanding and avoid rash decisions.
declarations.bibleVerseText: To have a fool for a child brings grief; there is no joy for the parent of a godless fool.

declarations.text: I find safety and strength in the name of the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The name of the Lord is a fortified tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.

declarations.text: I live with integrity, and my children are blessed.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The righteous lead blameless lives; blessed are their children after them.

declarations.text: I listen to the instruction of the wise and grow in wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wise in heart accept commands, but a chattering fool comes to ruin.

declarations.text: I keep my heart on the right path, and I avoid temptation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not swerve to the right or the left; keep your foot from evil.

declarations.text: I honor the Lord, and He fills my life with abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord brings wealth, without painful toil for it.

declarations.text: I am wise and choose my words carefully, bringing life to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The tongue of the wise adorns knowledge, but the mouth of the fool gushes folly.

declarations.text: I seek the Lord and find wisdom, which leads to joy and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those who find wisdom, those who gain understanding.

declarations.text: I am generous and give freely, knowing God blesses a cheerful giver.
declarations.bibleVerseText: One person gives freely, yet gains even more; another withholds unduly, but comes to poverty.

declarations.text: I listen to God's instruction and live a life of wisdom and understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Listen to my instruction and be wise; do not disregard it.

declarations.text: I am humble and fear the Lord, which brings me honor and life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Humility is the fear of the Lord; its wages are riches and honor and life.

declarations.text: I am wise, for I love discipline and seek correction.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever loves discipline loves knowledge, but whoever hates correction is stupid.

declarations.text: I am a good friend, showing love at all times.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for a time of adversity.

declarations.text: I honor my parents and receive the blessing of a long life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My son, keep your father’s command and do not forsake your mother’s teaching.

declarations.text: I am slow to speak and quick to listen, showing wisdom in my actions.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Even fools are thought wise if they keep silent, and discerning if they hold their tongues.

declarations.text: I walk in the fear of the Lord, and it is a fountain of life for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fear of the Lord is a fountain of life, turning a person from the snares of death.

declarations.text: I seek wisdom and it leads me to a life of honor and success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wise inherit honor, but fools get only shame.

declarations.text: I am calm and patient, understanding that anger leads to mistakes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever is patient has great understanding, but one who is quick-tempered displays folly.

declarations.text: I am a light in the darkness, bringing joy and hope to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The path of the righteous is like the morning sun, shining ever brighter till the full light of day.

declarations.text: I am generous to the poor, and the Lord rewards me for my kindness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever is kind to the poor lends to the Lord, and he will reward them for what they have done.

declarations.text: I avoid gossip, and I protect the privacy and dignity of others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A gossip betrays a confidence, but a trustworthy person keeps a secret.

declarations.text: I am prudent and think carefully before I act, avoiding danger.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The prudent see danger and take refuge, but the simple keep going and pay the penalty.

declarations.text: I listen to God’s instruction, and I find life, prosperity, and honor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever gives heed to instruction prospers, and blessed is the one who trusts in the Lord.

declarations.text: I live with a heart of understanding, bringing joy to those around me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: A person finds joy in giving an apt reply—and how good is a timely word!

declarations.text: I work hard and diligently, avoiding laziness and reaping the rewards.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lazy hands make for poverty, but diligent hands bring wealth.

declarations.text: I am wise in my choices.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not set foot on the path of the wicked or walk in the way of evildoers.

declarations.text: The Lord blesses and keeps me; He is always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.

declarations.text: God grants me peace and surrounds me with His love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord turn his face toward you and give you peace.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because the Lord is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid of them; the Lord your God himself will fight for you.

declarations.text: God's promise is true, and I trust in His faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not one of all the Lord’s good promises to Israel failed; every one was fulfilled.

declarations.text: I am blessed because God is my guide and protector.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is with you when you are with him. If you seek him, he will be found by you.

declarations.text: God goes before me, and I follow His lead.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whenever the cloud lifted from above the tent, the Israelites set out; wherever the cloud settled, the Israelites encamped.

declarations.text: The Lord fights my battles, and I am victorious through Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: I am counted among God’s people, and He remembers me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Moses, 'Take a census of the whole Israelite community by their clans and families, listing every man by name, one by one.'

declarations.text: God's presence goes with me, bringing me peace and rest.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: The Lord hears my prayers and answers me according to His will.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then he said to Moses, 'Say to the Israelites: If anyone sins unintentionally and does what is forbidden in any of the Lord’s commands—

declarations.text: I am safe under God's protection, for He is my refuge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Israelites are to give the Levites towns to live in and pasturelands for the cattle they own and all their other animals.

declarations.text: God’s blessings surround me, and He multiplies His favor upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will look on you with favor and make you fruitful and increase your numbers, and I will keep my covenant with you.

declarations.text: I trust in God's promises, for He is faithful to fulfill them.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is not human, that he should lie, not a human being, that he should change his mind. Does he speak and then not act? Does he promise and not fulfill?
