declarations.text: I walk in God's guidance, and He leads me to a land of blessing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And you shall see it and take possession of it, for I have given this land to you to possess it.

declarations.text: The Lord is my healer, and His power brings me health.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Lord, who heals you.

declarations.text: I am set apart for God's purposes, chosen by Him to serve.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have taken the Levites from among the Israelites in place of the first male offspring of every Israelite woman. The Levites are mine.

declarations.text: I am strengthened by God's word and His promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: All the Lord’s commands to Moses were carried out by the Israelites.

declarations.text: I am covered by God's grace, and He forgives my sins.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But if you seek forgiveness for your sin before you realize it, you will be forgiven.

declarations.text: God’s power is with me, making me victorious in all things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But Moses replied, 'Are you jealous for my sake? I wish that all the Lord’s people were prophets and that the Lord would put his Spirit on them!'

declarations.text: I am blessed because I walk in obedience to God's word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Obey all these regulations as long as you live in the land, and you will prosper.

declarations.text: I am under God's protection, and His angels guard my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The angel of the Lord went ahead of Israel’s army, and He guided them to victory.

declarations.text: God is my leader, and I follow His direction each day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whenever the cloud lifted from above the tent, the Israelites set out; wherever the cloud settled, the Israelites encamped.

declarations.text: I am counted among God's people, chosen and beloved by Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take a census of the whole Israelite community by their clans and families, listing every man by name, one by one.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers and remembers His covenant with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God heard their groaning and He remembered His covenant with Abraham, with Isaac, and with Jacob.

declarations.text: The Lord provides for me, and I am never in need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And when they measured it by the omer, the one who gathered much did not have too much, and the one who gathered little did not have too little.

declarations.text: I am strong in the Lord, for He fights my battles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.

declarations.text: God's promises are true, and He leads me to a land of abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The land we passed through and explored is exceedingly good.

declarations.text: I walk in faith, believing that God is greater than my fears.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid of them. The Lord your God himself will fight for you.

declarations.text: God goes before me, clearing the path and making a way.

declarations.text: I am victorious because God’s presence is with me always.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is with us. Do not be afraid of them.

declarations.text: God is my guide, and He leads me to green pastures.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When the cloud settled over the camp, the Israelites would set out.

declarations.text: The Lord blesses me and keeps me in all my ways.

declarations.text: I am set apart for God's purposes, and His hand is upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have taken the Levites from among the Israelites in place of the first male offspring of every Israelite woman.

declarations.text: God provides for all my needs, and I lack nothing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will bring you meat to eat in the evening and all the bread you want in the morning.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by God's love and grace, which sustain me daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And they spread among the Israelites a bad report about the land they had explored.

declarations.text: God's glory fills my life, and I reflect His light to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The glory of the Lord appeared at the tent of meeting to all the Israelites.

declarations.text: The Lord protects and leads me through the wilderness of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: On the day the tabernacle, the tent of the covenant law, was set up, the cloud covered it. From evening till morning, the cloud above the tabernacle looked like fire.

declarations.text: I am guided by the Lord’s light and His presence surrounds me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whenever the cloud lifted from above the tent, the Israelites set out; wherever the cloud settled, the Israelites encamped.

declarations.text: God’s favor rests on me, and He leads me to places of peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: At the Lord’s command the Israelites set out, and at his command they encamped.

declarations.text: I am not alone; the Lord goes before me and fights my battles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid of them; the Lord your God himself will fight for you.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord’s provision, for He never leaves me lacking.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Israelites ate manna forty years, until they came to a land that was settled.

declarations.text: The Lord has chosen me, and I am set apart for His purposes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Moses: 'I have taken the Levites from among the Israelites in place of the first male offspring of every Israelite woman. The Levites are mine.'

declarations.text: God’s promises to me are sure, and He fulfills His word in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is not human, that he should lie, not a human being, that he should change his mind. Does he speak and then not act?

declarations.text: I am not afraid, for God’s presence surrounds me and He gives me strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Caleb silenced the people before Moses and said, 'We should go up and take possession of the land, for we can certainly do it.'

declarations.text: The Lord grants me peace and refreshes my soul.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.

declarations.text: I find strength in God’s promises, for He never fails me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not one of all the Lord’s good promises to Israel failed; every one was fulfilled.

declarations.text: I am empowered by God to move forward with courage and faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Moses, 'Send some men to explore the land of Canaan, which I am giving to the Israelites.'

declarations.text: I trust in God’s strength, and through Him, I am victorious.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord your God is the one who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies to give you victory.

declarations.text: God’s grace sustains me, and I am strengthened by His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: I am a part of God’s family, and His blessings flow through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Moses, 'Tell Aaron and his sons, This is how you are to bless the Israelites.'

declarations.text: I am victorious because the Lord fights for me and grants me strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God is the one who will fight for you, just as he did for you in Egypt, before your very eyes.

declarations.text: God’s word is my strength, and He grants me peace in all situations.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord turn his face toward you and give you peace.

declarations.text: I am filled with the Lord’s grace, and His face shines upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.

declarations.text: I walk in the favor of the Lord, and His blessings overflow in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will look on you with favor and make you fruitful and increase your numbers.

declarations.text: I am not alone, for the Lord is with me, leading me in every step.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whenever the cloud lifted from above the tent, the Israelites set out.

declarations.text: God is my guide and protector, and He never leaves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The cloud of the Lord was over the tabernacle by day, and fire was in the cloud by night, in the sight of all the Israelites during all their travels.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because the Lord goes before me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.

declarations.text: God's word is in my heart, guiding my steps each day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Fix these words of mine in your hearts and minds; tie them as symbols on your hands and bind them on your foreheads.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I obey the Lord's commands.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you fully obey the Lord your God and carefully follow all his commands I give you today, the Lord your God will set you high above all the nations on earth.

declarations.text: The Lord is my refuge and fortress; He protects me from all harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He is your shield and helper and your glorious sword.

declarations.text: God goes before me to fight my battles and give me victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid of them; the Lord your God himself will fight for you.

declarations.text: I choose life and blessings by walking in God's ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have set before you life and death, blessings and curses. Now choose life, so that you and your children may live.

declarations.text: I am the head and not the tail, above and not beneath.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will make you the head, not the tail. If you pay attention to the commands of the Lord your God that I give you this day and carefully follow them, you will always be at the top, never at the bottom.

declarations.text: God is my rock, and I trust in His perfect plans for my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He is the Rock, his works are perfect, and all his ways are just.

declarations.text: I love the Lord with all my heart, soul, and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God, a treasured possession, set apart for His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you are a people holy to the Lord your God. The Lord your God has chosen you out of all the peoples on the face of the earth to be his people, his treasured possession.

declarations.text: I have life and prosperity through obedience to God’s word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Walk in obedience to all that the Lord your God has commanded you, so that you may live and prosper and prolong your days in the land that you will possess.

declarations.text: God’s love and faithfulness surround me, and I am never alone.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves. He will take great delight in you; in his love he will no longer rebuke you, but will rejoice over you with singing.

declarations.text: I am under God's protection, and no weapon formed against me will prosper.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The eternal God is your refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms. He will drive out your enemies before you, saying, ‘Destroy them!’

declarations.text: God blesses the work of my hands, and I am fruitful in all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will send a blessing on your barns and on everything you put your hand to.

declarations.text: I am called to be strong and courageous, for the Lord is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: I am blessed in the city and blessed in the country; God’s favor is upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be blessed in the city and blessed in the country.

declarations.text: God’s word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: These commandments that I give you today are to be on your hearts. Impress them on your children. Talk about them when you sit at home and when you walk along the road, when you lie down and when you get up.

declarations.text: I walk in God’s ways, and He grants me success and prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Keep this Book of the Law always on your lips; meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do everything written in it. Then you will be prosperous and successful.

declarations.text: I am God’s special possession, set apart for His glory and purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God has chosen you out of all the peoples on the face of the earth to be his people, his treasured possession.

declarations.text: God renews my strength and fills me with His power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God is the one who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies to give you victory.

declarations.text: I walk in God's ways, and His blessings overflow in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be blessed when you come in and blessed when you go out.

declarations.text: God's presence goes with me, bringing peace and comfort.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: I am obedient to God's word, and it brings me life and prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See, I set before you today life and prosperity, death and destruction.

declarations.text: I am not afraid because the Lord my God fights for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be fainthearted or afraid; do not panic or be terrified by them. For the Lord your God is the one who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies to give you victory.

declarations.text: God's commands are my guide, leading me to a life of blessing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Walk in obedience to all that the Lord your God has commanded you, so that you may live and prosper and prolong your days in the land that you will possess.

declarations.text: I am safe in God's hands, and His everlasting arms uphold me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The eternal God is your refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms.

declarations.text: God is my healer, and He brings wholeness to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He is the one who heals all your diseases.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He is faithful to fulfill His promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Know therefore that the Lord your God is God; he is the faithful God, keeping his covenant of love to a thousand generations of those who love him and keep his commandments.

declarations.text: I am called to love God with all my heart, soul, and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.

declarations.text: God's blessings flow in my life because I listen to His voice.
declarations.bibleVerseText: All these blessings will come on you and accompany you if you obey the Lord your God.

declarations.text: I am under God's protection, for He is a consuming fire.

declarations.text: I am the head and not the tail; God raises me up for His purpose.

declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord came on him, so that he became Israel’s judge and went to war.

declarations.text: I am not alone; God is with me and fights my battles for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord answered, 'I will be with you, and you will strike down all the Midianites, leaving none alive.'

declarations.text: God uses my strengths to accomplish His purposes in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord came upon him, and he judged Israel.

declarations.text: I find peace in God’s presence, even in the midst of the storm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord said to him, 'Peace! Do not be afraid. You are not going to die.'

declarations.text: God is my deliverer; He rescues me from my troubles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when they cried out to the Lord, he raised up for them a deliverer.

declarations.text: I am strong in the Lord, and He gives me victory over my enemies.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When the Spirit of the Lord came on him, he tore the lion apart with his bare hands as he might have torn a young goat.

declarations.text: God empowers me to do great things for His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord came upon him, and he judged Israel.

declarations.text: I trust in God's plan, knowing He uses ordinary people for extraordinary purposes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord answered, 'I will be with you, and you will strike down all the Midianites.'

declarations.text: God is my refuge and strength; He is always ready to help in times of trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when the Israelites cried out to the Lord for help, the Lord raised up a deliverer.

declarations.text: I am filled with God's strength, enabling me to conquer any challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord came on him, so that he became Israel’s judge and went to war.

declarations.text: I find rest in the Lord, who gives me peace and security.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So the land had peace for forty years, until Othniel son of Kenaz died.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers and sends help in my time of need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when they cried out to the Lord, he raised up for them a deliverer.

declarations.text: God's power is within me, giving me strength and courage.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord came powerfully upon him.

declarations.text: I am victorious because God is on my side.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord answered, 'I will be with you.'

declarations.text: I trust in God's strength, which is made perfect in my weakness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord said to him, 'Peace! Do not be afraid. You are not going to die.'

declarations.text: God gives me the strength to defeat my enemies and overcome obstacles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Spirit of the Lord came on Gideon, and he blew a trumpet, summoning the Abiezrites to follow him.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God to fulfill His purpose in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when they cried out to the Lord, he raised up for them a deliverer.

declarations.text: God is my strength and shield; He prepares me for every battle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord came upon him, and he judged Israel.

declarations.text: I rely on God’s strength, and He helps me to stand firm and be courageous.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord turned to him and said, 'Go in the strength you have and save Israel out of Midian’s hand. Am I not sending you?'

declarations.text: God empowers me with His Spirit, making me strong and courageous.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord came on him, so that he became Israel’s judge and went to war.

declarations.text: I am loyal and committed to the path God has set before me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Where you go I will go, and where you stay I will stay. Your people will be my people and your God my God.

declarations.text: I trust God’s plan for my life, and I follow Him faithfully.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord deal with me, be it ever so severely, if even death separates you and me.

declarations.text: God leads me to places of provision and blessing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So she went out, entered a field and began to glean behind the harvesters.

declarations.text: I am blessed because of my loyalty and kindness to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you, my daughter. This kindness is greater than that which you showed earlier.

declarations.text: God restores and renews everything I have lost.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The women said to Naomi: Praise be to the Lord, who this day has not left you without a guardian-redeemer.

declarations.text: I follow God wholeheartedly, and He provides for my needs.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So Boaz said to Ruth, 'My daughter, listen to me. Don’t go and glean in another field and don’t go away from here.'

declarations.text: I am rewarded for my faithfulness, and God protects me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord repay you for what you have done. May you be richly rewarded by the Lord, the God of Israel, under whose wings you have come to take refuge.

declarations.text: God is my redeemer, and He brings joy and purpose to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For your daughter-in-law, who loves you and who is better to you than seven sons, has given him birth.

declarations.text: I trust in God's timing, knowing He has great plans for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Naomi said to her daughter-in-law, 'It will be good for you, my daughter, to go with the women who work for him, because in someone else’s field you might be harmed.'

declarations.text: I am favored by the Lord, and He leads me to places of abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: At mealtime Boaz said to her, 'Come over here. Have some bread and dip it in the wine vinegar.'

declarations.text: God is faithful to provide, and I trust in His perfect provision.
declarations.bibleVerseText: She ate all she wanted and had some left over.

declarations.text: I walk in kindness and humility, and God blesses me greatly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord repay you for what you have done. May you be richly rewarded by the Lord, the God of Israel.

declarations.text: I am a person of integrity, and God's favor rests upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And now, my daughter, don’t be afraid. I will do for you all you ask. All the people of my town know that you are a woman of noble character.

declarations.text: God sees my faithfulness and opens doors of opportunity for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As she got up to glean, Boaz gave orders to his men, 'Let her gather among the sheaves and don’t reprimand her.'

declarations.text: God is my provider, and He blesses me with more than enough.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As she got up to glean, Boaz gave orders to his men, 'Let her gather among the sheaves and don’t reprimand her.'

declarations.text: I follow God in trust, and He brings me into relationships that bless my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord bless you, my daughter. This kindness is greater than that which you showed earlier.

declarations.text: God honors my loyalty and gives me a secure future.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The women said to Naomi: Praise be to the Lord, who this day has not left you without a guardian-redeemer.

declarations.text: God redeems my life and fills it with joy and purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Naomi took the child in her arms and cared for him.

declarations.text: I walk in faith, and God brings restoration to my soul.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord make the woman who is coming into your home like Rachel and Leah, who together built up the family of Israel.

declarations.text: God blesses my life with peace, joy, and loving relationships.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For your daughter-in-law, who loves you and who is better to you than seven sons, has given him birth.

declarations.text: I am confident in God's strength, and He leads me to victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will deliver me from the hand of this Philistine.

declarations.text: I listen to God's voice and respond with faith and obedience.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Speak, for your servant is listening.

declarations.text: God gives me courage to face every challenge and fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Don’t be afraid. You have done all this evil; yet do not turn away from the Lord, but serve the Lord with all your heart.

declarations.text: God prepares me for every battle and equips me with His power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: All those gathered here will know that it is not by sword or spear that the Lord saves; for the battle is the Lord’s.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s plan, and He leads me in paths of righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord will not forsake his people, for his great name’s sake, because it has pleased the Lord to make you a people for himself.

declarations.text: I am strong because the Lord is with me, and He goes before me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord was with Samuel as he grew up, and he let none of Samuel’s words fall to the ground.

declarations.text: I stand firm in faith, knowing that God gives me victory over my enemies.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David triumphed over the Philistine with a sling and a stone; without a sword in his hand he struck down the Philistine and killed him.

declarations.text: I seek God with all my heart, and He answers my prayers.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Hannah was praying in her heart, and her lips were moving but her voice was not heard. Eli thought she was drunk.

declarations.text: God is my refuge and strength; I fear nothing when He is with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid; you have found favor with God.

declarations.text: I am blessed by God, and He pours out His grace and favor upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord visited Hannah, and she conceived and bore three sons and two daughters.

declarations.text: God anoints me for His purpose, and I walk in His calling with confidence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So Samuel took the horn of oil and anointed him in the presence of his brothers, and from that day on the Spirit of the Lord came powerfully upon David.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God, and His Spirit fills me with wisdom and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit of the Lord will come powerfully upon you, and you will prophesy with them; and you will be changed into a different person.

declarations.text: I seek God's guidance, and He directs my steps to victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Samuel said, 'Assemble all Israel at Mizpah, and I will intercede with the Lord for you.'

declarations.text: God gives me strength to overcome every obstacle and challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David said to the Philistine, 'You come against me with sword and spear and javelin, but I come against you in the name of the Lord Almighty.'

declarations.text: I rely on God’s wisdom, and He shows me the way to go.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now go; I am sending you to Jesse of Bethlehem. I have chosen one of his sons to be king.

declarations.text: I find my strength in the Lord, and He gives me peace in every storm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When Samuel caught sight of Saul, the Lord said to him, 'This is the man I spoke to you about; he will govern my people.'

declarations.text: God's faithfulness surrounds me, and I walk in His favor daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord was with Samuel as he grew up, and he let none of Samuel’s words fall to the ground.

declarations.text: I am a servant of God, and I fulfill His purpose with joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But be sure to fear the Lord and serve him faithfully with all your heart; consider what great things he has done for you.

declarations.text: I trust in God's plan for my life, and He leads me to success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then Samuel took a stone and set it up between Mizpah and Shen. He named it Ebenezer, saying, 'Thus far the Lord has helped us.'

declarations.text: I am victorious because God goes before me in every battle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David ran quickly toward the battle line to meet him.

declarations.text: God sees my heart, and I am chosen by Him for great purposes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord does not look at the things people look at. People look at the outward appearance, but the Lord looks at the heart.

declarations.text: I am victorious because God gives me strength beyond my own.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord who rescued me from the paw of the lion and the paw of the bear will rescue me from the hand of this Philistine.

declarations.text: I walk in humility and God raises me up in His time.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Hannah prayed and said: 'My heart rejoices in the Lord; in the Lord my horn is lifted high.'

declarations.text: I trust in God’s timing and provision, and He never fails me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For this child I prayed, and the Lord has granted me what I asked of him.

declarations.text: God’s protection surrounds me, and I find peace in His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will guard the feet of his faithful servants, but the wicked will be silenced in the place of darkness.

declarations.text: I seek the Lord's wisdom, and He guides me with His truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Speak, for your servant is listening.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God, and He anoints me for His purposes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So Samuel took the horn of oil and anointed him in the presence of his brothers, and from that day on the Spirit of the Lord came powerfully upon David.

declarations.text: God fights my battles, and His power brings me victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is not by strength that one prevails; those who oppose the Lord will be broken.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s plan, and He directs my steps with wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Samuel did what the Lord said. When he arrived at Bethlehem, the elders of the town trembled when they met him.

declarations.text: God gives me courage to face every challenge without fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David said to the Philistine, 'You come against me with sword and spear and javelin, but I come against you in the name of the Lord Almighty.'

declarations.text: I walk in obedience to God's call, and He opens doors of opportunity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to Samuel, 'Do everything they say to you, for it is not you they have rejected, but they have rejected me as their king.'

declarations.text: God is my refuge, and I find strength and protection in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jonathan said to his young armor-bearer, 'Come, let’s go over to the outpost of those uncircumcised men. Perhaps the Lord will act in our behalf.'

declarations.text: God grants me favor and success as I walk in His will.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David had great success in everything he did, because the Lord was with him.

declarations.text: I find strength in the Lord and walk in His peace and purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord sends poverty and wealth; he humbles and he exalts.

declarations.text: God has a great plan for my life, and I trust in His timing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then David said to Saul, 'Let no one lose heart on account of this Philistine; your servant will go and fight him.'

declarations.text: I honor God with my life, and He blesses me with His favor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David found favor in the eyes of all the people and also in the sight of Saul’s servants.

declarations.text: I trust in God's wisdom, and He brings success to all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord was with Samuel as he grew up, and he let none of Samuel’s words fall to the ground.

declarations.text: God's strength and wisdom lead me to victory in every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gave Israel the victory that day, and the battle moved on beyond Beth Aven.

declarations.text: I am guided by God’s wisdom and grace, and He leads me to peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord was with Samuel as he grew up, and he let none of Samuel’s words fall to the ground.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I listen to God's call and respond in faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Samuel said, 'Speak, for your servant is listening.'

declarations.text: God is my shield, and He gives me strength in times of trouble.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge.

declarations.text: I walk in God’s protection, and He delivers me from all harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He reached down from on high and took hold of me; he drew me out of deep waters.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s strength, and He leads me to victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is God who arms me with strength and keeps my way secure.

declarations.text: God’s promises are true, and He never fails to deliver me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As for God, his way is perfect: The Lord’s word is flawless; he shields all who take refuge in him.

declarations.text: God lights my path and brings clarity to every situation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You, Lord, are my lamp; the Lord turns my darkness into light.

declarations.text: I find refuge in God, who is my fortress and my defender.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He is a shield for all who take refuge in him.

declarations.text: God's way is perfect, and I trust in His guidance and wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As for God, his way is perfect: The Lord’s word is flawless.

declarations.text: I am victorious because God gives me the strength to overcome.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With your help I can advance against a troop; with my God I can scale a wall.

declarations.text: God is my rock, and I stand firm in His strength and power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord lives! Praise be to my Rock! Exalted be my God, the Rock, my Savior!

declarations.text: God’s mercy surrounds me, and His love guides my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You make your saving help my shield; your help has made me great.

declarations.text: I walk in faith, knowing that God makes my way secure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is God who arms me with strength and keeps my way secure.

declarations.text: God's unfailing love surrounds me, and I am safe in His care.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord has dealt with me according to my righteousness; according to the cleanness of my hands he has rewarded me.

declarations.text: God’s help lifts me up and carries me through every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He lifted me out of deep waters.

declarations.text: I find peace in God's presence, and He gives me strength daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge.

declarations.text: God makes me victorious, and I overcome every obstacle with His help.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With your help I can advance against a troop; with my God I can scale a wall.

declarations.text: I rely on God’s strength, and He leads me in paths of victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He makes my feet like the feet of a deer; he causes me to stand on the heights.

declarations.text: God is my deliverer, and He rescues me from all my troubles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He rescued me from my powerful enemy, from my foes, who were too strong for me.

declarations.text: God equips me with strength and surrounds me with His favor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You make your saving help my shield; your help has made me great.

declarations.text: I am confident in God’s power to deliver me and guide my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You, Lord, are my lamp; the Lord turns my darkness into light.

declarations.text: God’s strength is made perfect in my weakness, and He gives me peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord lives! Praise be to my Rock! Exalted be my God, the Rock, my Savior!

declarations.text: I honor the Lord, and He establishes me in His purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now then, tell my servant David, ‘This is what the Lord Almighty says: I took you from the pasture, from tending the flock, and appointed you ruler over my people Israel.'

declarations.text: God has promised me peace and security, and I trust His word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will provide a place for my people Israel and will plant them so that they can have a home of their own and no longer be disturbed.

declarations.text: I praise God for His kindness, and I trust in His everlasting mercy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Who am I, Sovereign Lord, and what is my family, that you have brought me this far?

declarations.text: God is faithful to His promises, and I am blessed in His favor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you have established your people Israel as your very own forever, and you, Lord, have become their God.

declarations.text: I seek God’s will, and He blesses my house with favor and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Sovereign Lord, you are God! Your covenant is trustworthy, and you have promised these good things to your servant.

declarations.text: God's wisdom leads me in all things, and I walk in His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So David inquired of the Lord, and he answered, 'Go, for I will surely deliver the Philistines into your hands.'

declarations.text: I walk humbly before God, and He lifts me up in His time.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David became more and more powerful, because the Lord God Almighty was with him.

declarations.text: I find joy in worshiping God, and He delights in my praise.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David, wearing a linen ephod, danced before the Lord with all his might.

declarations.text: God's love covers me, and I find peace in His presence daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And David became angry because the Lord’s wrath had broken out against Uzzah, but later, he worshiped in joy.

declarations.text: God shows me kindness, and I am called to show it to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David asked, 'Is there anyone still left of the house of Saul to whom I can show kindness for Jonathan’s sake?'

declarations.text: God’s grace reaches me, and I extend it to others with love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will surely show you kindness for the sake of your father Jonathan. I will restore to you all the land that belonged to your grandfather Saul.

declarations.text: God’s mercy surrounds me, and He restores what was lost.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Mephibosheth lived in Jerusalem, because he always ate at the king’s table; he was lame in both feet.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s righteousness, and He brings justice to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David reigned over all Israel, doing what was just and right for all his people.

declarations.text: God’s presence goes before me, and I find success in His plans.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So David went to Baal Perazim, and there he defeated them. He said, 'As waters break out, the Lord has broken out against my enemies before me.'

declarations.text: I am filled with God’s peace, and He leads me beside still waters.
declarations.bibleVerseText: After the king was settled in his palace and the Lord had given him rest from all his enemies around him.

declarations.text: God leads me into His promises, and His plans for me are good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Your house and your kingdom will endure forever before me; your throne will be established forever.

declarations.text: I am guided by God’s wisdom, and He blesses me with peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When David heard this, he sent Joab out with the entire army of fighting men.

declarations.text: God is my refuge, and I trust in His protection always.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong, and let us fight bravely for our people and the cities of our God. The Lord will do what is good in his sight.

declarations.text: God’s justice prevails, and He brings peace to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When all the kings who were vassals of Hadadezer saw that they had been routed by Israel, they made peace with the Israelites and became subject to them.

declarations.text: God’s promises are true, and I walk in His abundant blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then David said, 'God has broken through my enemies before me, like a breakthrough of water.'

declarations.text: I walk in wisdom, and God blesses me with understanding and discernment.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So give your servant a discerning heart to govern your people and to distinguish between right and wrong.

declarations.text: God grants me wisdom beyond measure, and I use it to lead and serve others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God gave Solomon wisdom and very great insight, and a breadth of understanding as measureless as the sand on the seashore.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and His promises bring peace to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise be to the Lord, who has given rest to his people Israel just as he promised. Not one word has failed of all the good promises he gave.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and He answers with mercy and grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May your eyes be open toward this temple night and day, this place of which you said, ‘My Name shall be there.’

declarations.text: I walk in obedience to God's commands, and He strengthens my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you walk before me faithfully with integrity of heart and uprightness, I will establish your royal throne over Israel forever.

declarations.text: God’s wisdom guides me, and I build my life on His foundation of truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Solomon gave orders to build a temple for the Name of the Lord and a royal palace for himself.

declarations.text: I seek God’s presence daily, and His Spirit fills me with peace and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When the priests withdrew from the Holy Place, the cloud filled the temple of the Lord.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God, and His favor rests upon me wherever I go.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord appeared to Solomon a second time, as he had appeared to him at Gibeon.

declarations.text: I find strength in the Lord, and He leads me to victory in every battle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will strike down any nation that rises against Israel, just as He promised.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I seek God’s wisdom and walk in His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Solomon asked for a discerning heart, and God granted him both wisdom and wealth.

declarations.text: God's love surrounds me, and I find refuge in His faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord our God be with us, as he was with our ancestors; may he never leave us nor forsake us.

declarations.text: God’s word is true, and His promises bring peace to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not one word has failed of all the good promises he gave through his servant Moses.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and He blesses my life with peace and prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed be the Lord, who has given rest to his people, just as He promised.

declarations.text: I walk in God’s favor, and His presence guides me each day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When Solomon had finished building the temple of the Lord, the Lord said, ‘I have consecrated this temple by putting my Name there forever.’

declarations.text: God is with me, and He gives me the wisdom to lead and serve others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now, O Lord my God, you have made your servant king in place of my father David. But I am only a little child and do not know how to carry out my duties.

declarations.text: I trust in God's promises, and He establishes my steps in righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Walk in obedience to all I command you, and I will establish your royal throne.

declarations.text: I seek God’s wisdom in all things, and He grants me insight and clarity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When all Israel heard the verdict the king had given, they held the king in awe, because they saw that he had wisdom from God to administer justice.

declarations.text: God blesses me with understanding, and I use it to bless others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: People came from all nations to listen to Solomon’s wisdom, sent by all the kings of the world.

declarations.text: God’s promises are unchanging, and I find peace in His faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not one word has failed of all the good promises he gave.

declarations.text: God is my refuge and strength, and I trust in His unchanging love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord our God be with us as he was with our ancestors; may he never leave us nor forsake us.

declarations.text: God is my strength, and He makes me victorious in every battle.
