declarations.text: God’s love endures forever, and I am surrounded by His goodness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They sang to the Lord: 'He is good; his love endures forever.'

declarations.text: I seek the Lord with all my heart, and He strengthens me in every situation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the eyes of the Lord range throughout the earth to strengthen those whose hearts are fully committed to him.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and He delivers me from all my troubles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lord, there is no one like you to help the powerless against the mighty.

declarations.text: God blesses me with wisdom and understanding to walk in His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give me wisdom and knowledge, that I may lead this people.

declarations.text: I find peace in God’s presence, and He leads me beside still waters.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now let the fear of the Lord be on you. Judge carefully, for with the Lord our God there is no injustice.

declarations.text: God gives me victory in every battle, and I trust in His power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is with us; do not be afraid or discouraged.

declarations.text: I walk in the favor of God, and He establishes my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jehoshaphat became more and more powerful; he built forts and store cities in Judah.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, and I follow His commands with all my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He followed the ways of his father David, not turning aside to the right or to the left.

declarations.text: God is my defender, and I am victorious because He fights for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But with us is the Lord our God to help us and to fight our battles.

declarations.text: I humble myself before God, and He lifts me up in His strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When the Lord saw that they humbled themselves, this word of the Lord came to Shemaiah: 'Since they have humbled themselves, I will not destroy them.'

declarations.text: I rely on God’s wisdom, and He blesses me with success and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fear of the Lord fell on all the kingdoms of the land surrounding Judah, so that they did not make war with Jehoshaphat.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and He delivers me from every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when they were in trouble and turned to the Lord, the God of Israel, and sought him, he was found by them.

declarations.text: God’s presence brings me joy, and His peace fills my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then all the people went to Jerusalem to celebrate the festival of unleavened bread for seven days with great rejoicing.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and His promises never fail.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God answered him, 'Because this was in your heart and you have not asked for wealth, possessions, or honor.'

declarations.text: God’s wisdom fills my mind, and I make decisions with clarity and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So give your servant a discerning heart to govern your people and to distinguish between right and wrong.

declarations.text: God’s grace is with me, and I find strength in His love every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because the hand of the Lord was on them, they brought them back to Judah and Jerusalem.

declarations.text: I seek God’s direction, and He leads me on paths of righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jehoshaphat lived in Jerusalem, and he went out again among the people to bring them back to the Lord.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s protection, and He keeps me safe from all harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord blessed the king of Judah and gave him victory over his enemies.

declarations.text: Trust in the LORD and do good. Then you will live safely in the land and prosper.
Take delight in the LORD, and he will give you your heart’s desires.
Commit everything you do to the LORD. Trust him, and he will help you.
The LORD directs the steps of the godly. He delights in every detail of their lives.
I count it all joy when I face trials, knowing they strengthen my faith.
God gives me wisdom generously when I ask in faith.
I stand firm because my faith is tested, and I grow in perseverance.
Every good and perfect gift comes from above, from my Father of lights.
I am quick to listen, slow to speak, and slow to anger.
I am a doer of the Word, not just a hearer.
I walk in true religion by caring for those in need and keeping my life pure.
I do not show favoritism because I love others as God does.
Faith without works is dead, so I act in obedience to God.
I am justified by faith that produces good works.
I control my tongue and speak life, not destruction.
God’s wisdom in me is pure, peace-loving, and full of mercy.
I submit to God and resist the devil, and he flees from me.
When I draw near to God, He draws near to me.
I humble myself before the Lord, and He lifts me up.
I do not boast about tomorrow, for my life is in God’s hands.
When I know the good I ought to do, I do it.
The Lord’s coming is near, so I live with patience and endurance.
My yes is yes and my no is no; I speak with integrity.
When I am in trouble, I pray. When I am joyful, I sing praise.
The prayer of faith heals the sick, and the Lord raises them up.
I confess my sins and pray for others so that I may be healed.
The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective.
If I wander from the truth, I am restored by a brother or sister in Christ.
God gives grace to the humble, so I walk in humility.
I am chosen by God and set apart for His purpose.
I cast all my anxieties on God because He cares for me.
By Jesus’ wounds, I am healed and made whole.
I have been born again into a living hope through Jesus Christ.
My faith is being refined, and it is more precious than gold.
I am called to be holy as God is holy.
I have been redeemed by the precious blood of Jesus.
The Word of the Lord stands forever, and I trust in it.
I love deeply, for love covers a multitude of sins.
I am being built into a spiritual house, holy and acceptable to God.
I walk in humility, for God gives grace to the humble.
The Lord strengthens and restores me after I suffer for a little while.
I live in reverent fear, knowing that I am ransomed by Christ.
I declare praises to God, for He has called me out of darkness into His light.
I do not fear suffering for Christ, for His Spirit rests on me.
I do not repay evil with evil but bless others as God blesses me.
I am an heir of the gracious gift of life, and my prayers are powerful.
I am self-controlled and alert, resisting the enemy in faith.
God has called me to His eternal glory in Christ.
I live with an imperishable inheritance kept in heaven for me.
I keep my conduct honorable, that others may glorify God.
I entrust myself to God, my faithful Creator, in doing good.
I am free in Christ, and I use my freedom to serve others.
God has called me to His marvelous light, and I live in His glory.
God has given me everything I need for life and godliness.
I have great and precious promises from God.
I add to my faith goodness, knowledge, and self-control.
If I grow in godliness, I will never be ineffective or unfruitful.
I am called and chosen by God, and I make my calling sure.
If I stand firm in Christ, I will never stumble.
I will receive a rich welcome into the eternal kingdom of my Lord.
God’s Word is a light shining in a dark place.
Prophecy comes from God, and His Spirit reveals truth.
I guard my faith against false teachings and deception.
The Lord knows how to rescue the godly from trials.
I grow in grace and knowledge of my Lord Jesus Christ.
God is patient with me, not wanting anyone to perish.
I live a holy and godly life as I await the Lord’s return.
I look forward to the new heaven and new earth, where righteousness dwells.
I make every effort to be spotless, blameless, and at peace with God.
I am aware of false teachings and stand firm in the truth.
I grow in my faith daily through the knowledge of Christ.
Jesus is my Lord and Savior, and I walk in His grace.
I escape the corruption of the world through God’s divine nature.
I am diligent in growing in faith and godly character.
God’s promises allow me to share in His divine nature.
I stand firm in the truth of God’s Word.
I am not led astray by false doctrines, but I grow in Christ.
Jesus Christ is my righteousness, and I walk in His grace.
Jesus is the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.

declarations.text: Blessed is the one who reads and takes to heart the words of this prophecy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

declarations.text: Jesus holds the keys of death and the grave; I have victory in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Living One; I was dead, and now look, I am alive forever and ever! And I hold the keys of death and Hades.

declarations.text: The Lord will wipe away every tear, and there will be no more pain.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away.

declarations.text: I overcome by the blood of the Lamb and the word of my testimony.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They triumphed over him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony; they did not love their lives so much as to shrink from death.

declarations.text: Jesus is coming soon, and I live in readiness for His return.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Look, I am coming soon! My reward is with me, and I will give to each person according to what they have done.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror because Jesus has already won the victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They will wage war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will triumph over them because he is Lord of lords and King of kings—and with him will be his called, chosen and faithful followers.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I wash my robes in the blood of the Lamb.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those who wash their robes, that they may have the right to the tree of life and may go through the gates into the city.

declarations.text: The Lord makes all things new; my future is filled with hope.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who was seated on the throne said, 'I am making everything new!' Then he said, 'Write this down, for these words are trustworthy and true.'

declarations.text: I reign with Christ forever as a child of God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There will be no more night. They will not need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun, for the Lord God will give them light. And they will reign for ever and ever.

declarations.text: The Lamb is my Shepherd, and He leads me to living water.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lamb at the center of the throne will be their shepherd; he will lead them to springs of living water. And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes.

declarations.text: I worship God alone, for He is worthy of all glory and honor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are worthy, our Lord and God, to receive glory and honor and power, for you created all things, and by your will they were created and have their being.

declarations.text: The Lord fights for me, and I am victorious in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I saw heaven standing open and there before me was a white horse, whose rider is called Faithful and True. With justice he judges and wages war.

declarations.text: Jesus is my bright and morning star, guiding me in His light.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I, Jesus, have sent my angel to give you this testimony for the churches. I am the Root and the Offspring of David, and the bright Morning Star.

declarations.text: My name is written in the Lamb’s book of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.

declarations.text: God’s dwelling is with His people, and I am His forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I heard a loud voice from the throne saying, 'Look! God’s dwelling place is now among the people, and he will dwell with them. They will be his people, and God himself will be with them and be their God.'

declarations.text: The Spirit and the Bride say, ‘Come!’ I drink freely from the water of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Spirit and the bride say, 'Come!' And let the one who hears say, 'Come!' Let the one who is thirsty come; and let the one who wishes take the free gift of the water of life.

declarations.text: Jesus stands at the door and knocks; I open my heart to Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Here I am! I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in and eat with that person, and they with me.

declarations.text: I will sit with Jesus on His throne as He has overcome.
declarations.bibleVerseText: To the one who is victorious, I will give the right to sit with me on my throne, just as I was victorious and sat down with my Father on his throne.

declarations.text: I am victorious because the Lamb has already overcome the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then one of the elders said to me, 'Do not weep! See, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has triumphed. He is able to open the scroll and its seven seals.'

declarations.text: The Lord gives me hidden manna, and I have a new name in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: To the one who is victorious, I will give some of the hidden manna. I will also give that person a white stone with a new name written on it, known only to the one who receives it.

declarations.text: I am clothed in white, pure and holy before the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The one who is victorious will, like them, be dressed in white. I will never blot out the name of that person from the book of life, but will acknowledge that name before my Father and his angels.

declarations.text: God makes me a pillar in His temple, and I will never leave His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The one who is victorious I will make a pillar in the temple of my God. Never again will they leave it.

declarations.text: I will reign with Christ forever as part of His kingdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have made them to be a kingdom and priests to serve our God, and they will reign on the earth.

declarations.text: I am sealed by God and belong to Him forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then I heard the number of those who were sealed: 144,000 from all the tribes of Israel.

declarations.text: My prayers rise before God like incense.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The smoke of the incense, together with the prayers of God’s people, went up before God from the angel’s hand.

declarations.text: The Lord is my refuge, and He shelters me under His wings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The woman was given the two wings of a great eagle, so that she might fly to the place prepared for her in the wilderness, where she would be taken care of for a time, times and half a time, out of the serpent’s reach.

declarations.text: I do not fear because Jesus has already won the battle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They will wage war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will triumph over them because he is Lord of lords and King of kings.

declarations.text: Jesus is my light, and there is no darkness in His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The city does not need the sun or the moon to shine on it, for the glory of God gives it light, and the Lamb is its lamp.

declarations.text: I stand at the door and let Jesus into my life daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Here I am! I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in and eat with that person, and they with me.

declarations.text: I am called to remain faithful and true in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: This calls for patient endurance on the part of the people of God who keep his commands and remain faithful to Jesus.

declarations.text: The Lord writes my name in His book, and I am His forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Nothing impure will ever enter it, nor will anyone who does what is shameful or deceitful, but only those whose names are written in the Lamb’s book of life.

declarations.text: I am victorious, and I receive the crown of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be faithful, even to the point of death, and I will give you life as your victor’s crown.

declarations.text: I inherit all things, and God is my Father.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Those who are victorious will inherit all this, and I will be their God and they will be my children.

declarations.text: I rejoice because my Redeemer is coming soon.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who testifies to these things says, 'Yes, I am coming soon.' Amen. Come, Lord Jesus.

declarations.text: Jesus is the faithful witness, and I trust in His Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, the firstborn from the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth.

declarations.text: I receive the water of life freely from the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the one who is thirsty come; and let the one who wishes take the free gift of the water of life.

declarations.text: I stand firm, for my God is victorious.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then I saw heaven opened, and there was before me a white horse, whose rider is called Faithful and True. With justice he judges and wages war.

declarations.text: God has chosen me and loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we know, brothers and sisters loved by God, that he has chosen you.

declarations.text: The gospel gives me power and full conviction.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because our gospel came to you not simply with words but also with power, with the Holy Spirit and deep conviction.

declarations.text: I rejoice always and give thanks in all circumstances.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice always, pray continually, give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: God strengthens my heart to be blameless before Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May he strengthen your hearts so that you will be blameless and holy in the presence of our God and Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all his holy ones.

declarations.text: The Lord is faithful, and He protects me from evil.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: God has called me to live a holy and pure life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God did not call us to be impure, but to live a holy life.

declarations.text: God Himself gives me peace at all times.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way.

declarations.text: Jesus will rescue me from the coming wrath.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead—Jesus, who rescues us from the coming wrath.

declarations.text: My labor in the Lord is not in vain.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you know that our labor in the Lord is not in vain.

declarations.text: I am destined for salvation through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God did not appoint us to suffer wrath but to receive salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I encourage and build up others with my words.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore encourage one another and build each other up, just as in fact you are doing.

declarations.text: I am a child of the light and live in the day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are all children of the light and children of the day. We do not belong to the night or to the darkness.

declarations.text: The Lord Himself will come for me, and I will be with Him forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord himself will come down from heaven, with a loud command, with the voice of the archangel and with the trumpet call of God, and the dead in Christ will rise first.

declarations.text: I live to please God and grow more in His love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As for other matters, brothers and sisters, we instructed you how to live in order to please God, as in fact you are living. Now we ask you and urge you in the Lord Jesus to do this more and more.

declarations.text: The Lord strengthens and encourages my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and by his grace gave us eternal encouragement and good hope, encourage your hearts and strengthen you in every good deed and word.

declarations.text: I remain alert and self-controlled, living in the light.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So then, let us not be like others, who are asleep, but let us be awake and sober.

declarations.text: I love others deeply and increase in love every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord make your love increase and overflow for each other and for everyone else, just as ours does for you.

declarations.text: I walk in holiness, avoiding impurity and sin.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For this is the will of God, your sanctification: that you should abstain from sexual immorality.

declarations.text: I encourage and comfort others as I wait for Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore encourage one another with these words.

declarations.text: God is faithful, and He will sanctify me completely.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The one who calls you is faithful, and he will do it.

declarations.text: I abstain from every form of evil and walk in righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Reject every kind of evil.

declarations.text: I hold on to what is good and reject what is evil.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Hold on to what is good, reject every kind of evil.

declarations.text: I pray continually, staying close to God in all things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Pray continually.

declarations.text: God’s peace sanctifies my whole spirit, soul, and body.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May God himself, the God of peace, sanctify you through and through. May your whole spirit, soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: God strengthens and protects me from the evil one.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: God’s grace and peace are always with me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Grace and peace to you from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: God’s love and perseverance give me strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord direct your hearts into God’s love and Christ’s perseverance.

declarations.text: I stand firm and hold fast to God’s teachings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So then, brothers and sisters, stand firm and hold fast to the teachings we passed on to you, whether by word of mouth or by letter.

declarations.text: The Lord encourages my heart and strengthens me in every good work.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and by his grace gave us eternal encouragement and good hope, encourage your hearts and strengthen you in every good deed and word.

declarations.text: God is just, and He repays trouble with justice.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is just: He will pay back trouble to those who trouble you.

declarations.text: I am counted worthy of God’s calling, and He fulfills His purpose in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With this in mind, we constantly pray for you, that our God may make you worthy of his calling, and that by his power he may bring to fruition your every desire for goodness and your every deed prompted by faith.

declarations.text: I glorify Jesus Christ through my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We pray this so that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you, and you in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I do not become weary in doing good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And as for you, brothers and sisters, never tire of doing what is good.

declarations.text: God chose me for salvation and sanctifies me through the Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But we ought always to thank God for you, brothers and sisters loved by the Lord, because God chose you as firstfruits to be saved through the sanctifying work of the Spirit and through belief in the truth.

declarations.text: I am comforted and strengthened by God's grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and by his grace gave us eternal encouragement and good hope, encourage your hearts and strengthen you in every good deed and word.

declarations.text: The Lord gives me peace at all times in every way.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way.

declarations.text: I am counted worthy of God's kingdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: All this is evidence that God’s judgment is right, and as a result you will be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which you are suffering.

declarations.text: God calls me to share in the glory of Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He called you to this through our gospel, that you might share in the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: God strengthens and protects me from the evil one.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.

declarations.text: I pray that God's message spreads rapidly and is honored.
declarations.bibleVerseText: As for other matters, brothers and sisters, pray for us that the message of the Lord may spread rapidly and be honored, just as it was with you.

declarations.text: I am warned against idleness and called to work diligently.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For even when we were with you, we gave you this rule: 'The one who is unwilling to work shall not eat.'

declarations.text: I live in faith and perseverance despite trials.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We boast about your perseverance and faith in all the persecutions and trials you are enduring.

declarations.text: The Lord directs my heart into His love and Christ’s perseverance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord direct your hearts into God’s love and Christ’s perseverance.

declarations.text: I obey God's commands and do not associate with those who walk in disobedience.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take special note of anyone who does not obey our instruction in this letter. Do not associate with them, in order that they may feel ashamed.

declarations.text: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

declarations.text: No weapon formed against me shall prosper, and I condemn every tongue that rises against me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No weapon formed against you shall prosper, and every tongue which rises against you in judgment You shall condemn.

declarations.text: God has not given me a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and a sound mind.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.

declarations.text: My God supplies all my needs according to His riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God shall supply all your need according to His riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: By the stripes of Jesus, I am healed.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By His stripes we are healed.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord with all my heart, and He directs my paths.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding; In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct your paths.

declarations.text: The Lord has made me the head and not the tail, above and not beneath.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the Lord will make you the head and not the tail; you shall be above only, and not be beneath.

declarations.text: The Lord my God is with me wherever I go. I am strong and courageous.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Have I not commanded you? Be strong and of good courage; do not be afraid, nor be dismayed, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go.

declarations.text: In all things, I am more than a conqueror through Him who loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Yet in all these things we are more than conquerors through Him who loved us.

declarations.text: I hold fast to my confession of faith, for God who promised is faithful.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering, for He who promised is faithful.

declarations.text: I dwell in the secret place of the Most High and abide under His shadow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

declarations.text: God is working all things together for my good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And we know that all things work together for good to those who love God, to those who are called according to His purpose.

declarations.text: I seek first the kingdom of God, and everything I need is provided.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things shall be added to you.

declarations.text: This is the day the Lord has made; I will rejoice and be glad in it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: This is the day the Lord has made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.

declarations.text: I trample upon lions and cobras; I crush fierce lions and serpents under my feet.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You shall tread upon the lion and the cobra, the young lion and the serpent you shall trample underfoot.

declarations.text: God satisfies me with long life and shows me His salvation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With long life I will satisfy him, and show him My salvation.

declarations.text: Nothing by any means shall harm me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Behold, I give you the authority to trample on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy, and nothing shall by any means hurt you.

declarations.text: I won’t give up—God’s blessing is coming at the right time.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us not grow weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.

declarations.text: God is making a way for me, even when I don’t see it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See, I am doing a new thing! Now it springs up; do you not perceive it? I am making a way in the wilderness and streams in the wasteland.

declarations.text: My youth is being renewed like the eagle’s, and I am full of strength and vitality.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Who satisfies your desires with good things so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.

declarations.text: I declare the blood of Jesus broke every chain, reversed every curse, and made my freedom final.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Christ has redeemed us from the curse of the law.

declarations.text: His blood didn’t just heal me—it erased what doctors couldn’t explain and made wholeness my new normal.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Daughter, your faith has made you well. Go in peace and be healed.

declarations.text: I stand healed—His blood paid in full for every part of me to be restored, strong, and thriving.
declarations.bibleVerseText: By His wounds we are healed.

declarations.text: I speak the blood over my mind—confusion flees, clarity floods in, and peace rules my thoughts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The mind governed by the Spirit is life and peace.

declarations.text: I am fully forgiven, forever clean, and boldly accepted—all because the blood settled my case in heaven.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins.

declarations.text: I don’t beg for access—I walk in because His blood tore the veil and made me welcome.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We have confidence to enter the Most Holy Place by the blood of Jesus.

declarations.text: Shame can’t speak—His blood declared me righteous, fearless, and bold before God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let us then approach God’s throne of grace with confidence.

declarations.text: Every lie of guilt and condemnation is silenced—His blood speaks innocence louder than my past.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: His blood didn’t just forgive me—it crushed the enemy’s plan and made me victorious forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He disarmed the powers and authorities... triumphing over them by the cross.

declarations.text: I am royalty now—His blood made me a child of the King and heir of everything He promised.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We are God’s children. Then we are heirs.

declarations.text: The blood of Jesus rewrote my identity—redeemed, chosen, and sealed forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You who once were far off have been brought near by the blood of Christ.

declarations.text: His blood didn’t whisper—it roared mercy over judgment and wrote peace into my soul.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The sprinkled blood that speaks a better word than the blood of Abel.

declarations.text: I am free, clean, whole, and fearless—not because I earned it, but because His blood secured it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You were redeemed with the precious blood of Christ, a lamb without blemish.

declarations.text: I shout the Name of Jesus—hell shakes, chains snap, and every demon flees.
declarations.bibleVerseText: At the name of Jesus every knee should bow, in heaven and on earth.

declarations.text: When I speak the Name of Jesus, healing and miracles erupt—nothing can stand against it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: His name, by faith in his name, has made this man strong.

declarations.text: By the Name of Jesus, I command sickness to bow—health flows like a river through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, walk.

declarations.text: I speak life—in Jesus’ Name, dead things rise and destinies awaken.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lazarus, come forth!

declarations.text: I declare the darkness broken—Jesus’ Name pierces like lightning and floods with light.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.

declarations.text: At the sound of His Name, chains fall, prisons shake, and freedom floods in.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

declarations.text: I release divine peace—chaos obeys when Jesus speaks through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Peace, be still. And the wind ceased.

declarations.text: I confess the Name of Jesus—hell’s grip breaks, and heaven roars back in response.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.

declarations.text: Provision flows, doors fly open, and favor surrounds me—because I carry His Name.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Ask in my name, and you will receive.

declarations.text: The Name of Jesus isn’t just spoken—it’s weaponized. I walk in kingdom authority now.
declarations.bibleVerseText: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me.

declarations.text: I speak revival—Jesus’ Name shakes the ground and awakens sleeping hearts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Restore to me the joy of your salvation and grant me a willing spirit.

declarations.text: I speak with fire—Jesus’ Name burns through every lie and ignites truth in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Is not my word like fire, declares the Lord.

declarations.text: When I declare Jesus’ Name, enemy plans implode and heaven enforces my words.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will grant that the enemies who rise up against you will be defeated before you.

declarations.text: I rise unshaken—storms may rage, but Jesus’ Name is my anchor and triumph.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Those who trust in the Lord are like Mount Zion, which cannot be shaken.
